name: Dracorage
description:
A small student project from a two-man team, Dracorage is a bullet hell-like, top down, vertical-scrolling shooter, in the same vein as games like Ikaruga.
Players will control a dragon, pursuing the mages who stole their clutch of eggs. The mages, of course, are prepared for this, and will do everything in their considerable power to stop you.
-  Fly between the air and ground to make the best use of your abilities, and get those eggs back -- and maybe earn some gold along the way.
- Dodge projectiles in the air, and block them on the ground. A dragon's skills are versatile indeed. Dodge or block with perfect timing, and you will receive both a greater score and a shorter cooldown!
- Crush mage towers to regain some health, and to halt the red runes in the sky. They say revenge is best served cold, but dragons would disagree.
-  Beware the slimemancer

Art, Sounds, and Music Acquisition -- LoremasterThranix
Coding, Concept, and Project Lead -- PinheadPants

Featuring royalty-free music by Kevin MacLeod
